Text: Why are you marking this as a new episode, when its far from it. i just hate those who do that. GET A LIFE

Actually, it is a new episode...
If you have watched it, you would knew...
s05e24 is called Confederate STEAM Gun, and contains none of these myths. both the needle in a haystack and the waterstuff were tested a long time ago by the busters.

Proper description from the official wiki:

EPISODE TITLE: Confederate Steam Gun

ORIGINAL AIR DATE: 12/05/07

SYNOPSIS: Jamie and Adam take on a mythical confederate weapon: a steam-powered machine gun rumored to fire 400 rounds a minute at a 300-yard range. Meanwhile, Kari, Grant, and Tory put their lying skills on the line to test mythical ways to beat a lie detector.


Myth #1: Steam Machine Gun
Will this civil war weapon prove deadly?

Myth #2: Beating the lie detector
Can physical or mental deception beat a polygraph or an F-MRI?
